snippet: Anne Donovan, who plans to step down as the women’s basketball coach at Seton Hall at the end of the season, will return to the W.N.B.A. to coach the Connecticut Sun.
abstract: Anne Donovan, who plans to step down as women’s basketball coach at Seton Hall at the end of the season, will return to WNBA to coach Connecticut Sun.
lead_paragraph: Anne Donovan, who plans to step down as the women’s basketball coach at Seton Hall at the end of the season, will return to the W.N.B.A. to coach the Connecticut Sun.

headline.main: Donovan Heading Back to Coach in W.N.B.A.
